description:
Every Kid should learn to play a musical instrument! Guitar is one of the easiest for Children to learn.

This is Udemy's 1st guitar course made specifically for kids!

This course will teach Kids How to Play the Guitar in the EASIEST and MOST FUN way! This course provides a RESPONSIVE and EXPERIENCED INSTRUCTOR who will answer student's questions (by Udemy's messaging system).

Step-by-step, the lessons break down the art of guitar playing, so fantastic results can be achieved quickly!

In this beginner's course, Kids will learn:

Chords - that can be used to play ANY song

Songs - that they are familiar with

Strumming - that they can apply to the songs

Rhythms - that will develop your listening

Picking - that will help to build dexterity

Techniques - to build good playing habits at an early age

Warm-up Exercises - to help with endurance

Tuning - to ensure great and accurate sound

How to choose a good guitar - to ensure a great learning experience

String names and notes- to give them musical awareness and develop their memory

Posture for playing- to help them play comfortably

Guitar Parts/Anatomy- which will teach them structural awareness for the guitar

and more...

The course uses Short and Simple Step-by-Step lessons to Keep Kids Engaged and Help them to Succeed.
title: Guitar for Kids and Beginners!
